languages.text: "Я не могу помочь с медитацией, но готов{mf||а} быть рядом, разделить тишину. Так ты сможешь на время забыть об ужасах Комморры".
"I cannot help with meditation, but I am prepared to stay with you and share the silence. That way, you will be able to forget about the horrors of Commorragh, if only for a little while."
languages.original_text: "Я не могу помочь с медитацией, но готов{mf||а} быть рядом, разделить тишину. Так ты сможешь на время забыть об ужасах Комморры".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot help with meditation, but I am prepared to stay with you and share the silence. That way, you will be able to forget about the horrors of Commorragh, if only for a little while."
"I cannot help with meditation, but I am prepared to stay with you and share the silence. That way, you will be able to forget about the horrors of Commorragh, if only for a little while."
"I cannot help with meditation, but I am prepared to stay with you and share the silence. That way, you will be able to forget about the horrors of Commorragh, if only for a little while."
"I cannot help with meditation, but I am prepared to stay with you and share the silence. That way, you will be able to forget about the horrors of Commorragh, if only for a little while."
"I cannot help with meditation, but I am prepared to stay with you and share the silence. That way, you will be able to forget about the horrors of Commorragh, if only for a little while."

languages.text: “我没办法帮助你进入冥想，但我可以和你一同分享静谧。或许这会让你忘记科摩罗的恐怖，哪怕只是暂时忘记也好。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot help with meditation, but I am prepared to stay with you and share the silence. That way, you will be able to forget about the horrors of Commorragh, if only for a little while."

traits.locale_text: “我没办法帮助你进入冥想，但我可以和你一同分享静谧。或许这会让你忘记科摩罗的恐怖，哪怕只是暂时忘记也好。”

languages.text: «No puedo ayudarte con la meditación, pero estoy {mf|dispuesto|dispuesta} a quedarme a tu lado y compartir el silencio. De ese modo podrás olvidar los horrores de Commorragh, aunque solo sea por un instante».
languages.original_text: "I cannot help with meditation, but I am prepared to stay with you and share the silence. That way, you will be able to forget about the horrors of Commorragh, if only for a little while."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo ayudarte con la meditación, pero estoy {mf|dispuesto|dispuesta} a quedarme a tu lado y compartir el silencio. De ese modo podrás olvidar los horrores de Commorragh, aunque solo sea por un instante».

languages.text: « Je ne peux pas vous aider à méditer, mais je suis {mf|prêt|prête} à rester à vos côtés pour savourer le silence. Ainsi, vous pourrez peut-être oublier les horreurs de Commorragh, ne serait-ce qu'un instant. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot help with meditation, but I am prepared to stay with you and share the silence. That way, you will be able to forget about the horrors of Commorragh, if only for a little while."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux pas vous aider à méditer, mais je suis {mf|prêt|prête} à rester à vos côtés pour savourer le silence. Ainsi, vous pourrez peut-être oublier les horreurs de Commorragh, ne serait-ce qu'un instant. »

languages.text: "Bei der Meditation kann ich nicht helfen, aber ich bleibe gerne und teile die Stille mit Euch. Dann könnt Ihr die Schrecken von Commorragh vergessen, wenn auch nur für kurze Zeit."
languages.original_text: "I cannot help with meditation, but I am prepared to stay with you and share the silence. That way, you will be able to forget about the horrors of Commorragh, if only for a little while."

traits.locale_text: "Bei der Meditation kann ich nicht helfen, aber ich bleibe gerne und teile die Stille mit Euch. Dann könnt Ihr die Schrecken von Commorragh vergessen, wenn auch nur für kurze Zeit."

languages.text: 「瞑想の手伝いはできないが、一緒にいて静寂をわかち合うことはできる。そうすれば、コモラフの恐怖を忘れることができるだろう。少しの間だけでも」
languages.original_text: "I cannot help with meditation, but I am prepared to stay with you and share the silence. That way, you will be able to forget about the horrors of Commorragh, if only for a little while."

traits.locale_text: 「瞑想の手伝いはできないが、一緒にいて静寂をわかち合うことはできる。そうすれば、コモラフの恐怖を忘れることができるだろう。少しの間だけでも」

languages.text: "Meditasyonuna yardımcı olamam ama seninle olup sessizliğini paylaşabilirim. Kısa süreliğine de olsa Commorragh'taki felaketi unutabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "I cannot help with meditation, but I am prepared to stay with you and share the silence. That way, you will be able to forget about the horrors of Commorragh, if only for a little while."

traits.locale_text: "Meditasyonuna yardımcı olamam ama seninle olup sessizliğini paylaşabilirim. Böylece kısa süreliğine de olsa Commorragh'taki felaketi unutabilirsin."
